input: Subject: A futuristic robot assistant; Characteristics: sleek metallic design with LED lights; Timing and lighting: indoor with artificial lighting; Background: modern smart home environment; Feeling: innovative and efficient.
output:
Here are the generated prompts for each subject:

A futuristic robot assistant, sleek in metallic design with vibrant LED lights, stands confidently amidst a sophisticated smart home setup - minimalist furniture and polished floors create an air of industrial chic. Artificial lighting - soft pulsing glow of LEDs synchronizes with its every movement as it interacts with the users nearby. A modern living room setting exudes high-tech innovation; no other household items in sight. Perfect for cutting-edge tech enthusiasts who crave smart comfort.

A futuristic robot assistant, sleek in metallic design with vibrant LED lights, elegantly perches on a minimalist wooden pedestal amidst an airy and minimalist modern smart home environment. Soft ambient lighting, a mix of warm and cool tones, complements its intricate details - gleaming metallic finishes, smooth curves, and gentle LED accents sparkle through the surrounding space. Innovative elegance pervades each element; seamless synergy between interior design and cutting-edge robotics is apparent here.

A futuristic robot assistant, sleek in metallic design with vibrant LED lights, comfortably positions itself near a stunning glass console table in an opulent smart living room setting - plush sofas and matching armchairs create a cozy atmosphere surrounding the modern electronics. Artificial lighting strategically illuminates its LED-lit components as it navigates its tasks - subtle warm tones soften shadows while bright highlights accentuate precision movements. Sophistication and refinement reign; sophisticated high-tech appliances seamlessly blend into contemporary decor.

A futuristic robot assistant, sleek in metallic design with vibrant LED lights, discreetly awaits the user's presence on a sleek glass coffee table within an elegant modern smart home setting - elegant glass vases adorn surrounding shelves and minimalist furniture provides a clean backdrop. Soft warm lighting softly envelops it as interactions progress; LED accents subtly shifting from deep blues to bright whites convey its high-tech capabilities through precision control. Intelligent elegance prevails amidst the ambient warmth of the living space.
complianceText:
No violations detected; each generated prompt is within 80 words, single paragraphs, follows the required structure, and is in English.
